metadata.title: CVE-2021-32606 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 5.11 through 5.12.2, isotp_setsockopt innet/can/isotp.c allows privilege escalation to root by leveraging ause-after-free. (This does not affect earlier versions that lack CAN ISOTPSF_BROADCAST support.)

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
